posts.post_title: For Sale - T206 Uzit and Red Hindu
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Jerry Totino
For sale the following T206 Red Hindu and Uzits:

SGC 40 Red Hindu - Tannehill (beautiful high end card for the grade)  -   $1,500

SGC 40 Uzit - Mullin with bat (also a beautiful high end card for the grade)   -  $2,000

SGC 30 Uzit - Wilhelm with bat - $1,400

Check or MO only

All prices include insured shipping.

Please email mmw2161@aol.com for scan requests. Scans will be provided very promptly.

Jerry Totino
